Address.Address1: Dubai Marina; after Diamonds 1-5 bldgs; between Dubai Marina Metro Station & Mall P. O. Box 454745

Description.Text: Marina View is a luxury residence located in the heart of Dubai marina, fully furnished by highly stylish decorates, the hotel's modern architecture is easily spotted against the Dubai skyline with an easy access to Dubai's Key Business, Leisure and Shopping Areas. It is located in one of the most luxurious area, the Dubai Marina.The well equipped meeting room can accommodate up to 30 people for intimate meetings, presentation or interview. Suitable coffee breaks, snacks or business lunch can be provided to close your successful deals.

Hotel is located in the most luxurious area in the Dubai Marina. This safe and sheltered hotel offers plenty of sunshine and close to the white sandy shores. It is an ideal holiday spot, overlooking the sparkling blue water of the Arabian Gulf. It is just 35 minutes drive from Dubai Airport, situated in the most prestigious and affluent area of Dubai, a walking distance from Dubai Marina Mall and Jumeirah beach, close to the city, famous shopping malls, banks, World Trade Centre and Dubai International Exhibition Centre.

Marina View Hotel has 172 Studio rooms (Deluxe Room) which are fully furnished and can accommodate 2 adults. All the studio rooms are designed keeping comfort in mind. The studio rooms have Internet Connection, Iron, Ironing board, Washing Machine, Kitchen, Kitchenette and Safe Box. The hotel has rooms of 355 Square feet for delegates with bed size ranging from king size to twin bed. All the studios have both side views, either Sheikh Zayed Road or Marina View.

Mosaic Caf√© opens from 06:00 PM to 02:00 AM serving quick snacks, sandwiches and cakes. It's an Ideal social gathering place for friends and families to enjoy the real taste of freshly Baked SAAJ.Marina's Pool Restaurant open for Lunch and Dinner Parties which can accommodate up to 200 people to celebrate their special events and enjoy the live and fresh BBQ items. An impressive and exclusive atmosphere will enhance your event prestigious. Marina View Hotel provides a truly Dining experience at your door step. The Hotel's Chefs are pleased to offer and serve you during your hosted parties at home or any where you think of. Marina view Hotel's team of experts can make it happen at all times.Room Service menu is served around the clock.Marina View Hotel's Pastry Shop is ready to get your cake orders and special cakes can be made availing 24 hours notice.
